overview: Recently, legendary guitarist Don Felder stopped by Guitar World HQ to demonstrate some classic Eagles riffs.  In the below video, Felder shows you how to play some key parts to the classic song, "Hotel California."  In honor of his work on the song, Gibson Custom recently issued two new signature Felder modelsâ€”the "Hotel California" 1959 Les Paul and the "Hotel California" EDS-1275.
title: Don Felder: Hotel California Lesson
